sources.title: Sharmilee
sources.description: Sharmilee is a hit 1971 Hindi movie produced by Subodh Mukherjee and directed by Samir Ganguly. The film stars Shashi Kapoor, Raakhee, Narendra Nath, Nazir Hussain, Iftekhar, S N Banerjee, Anita Guha and Asit Sen. Raakhee played a double role in this film, and its success helped make her one of the decade's top leading lady in Hindi films.
